casebody.data:
No. 10-204. E.S.H., Petitioner v. K.D., et al. 562 U.S. 1053, 131 S. Ct. 597,

178 L. Ed. 2d 452,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8855. November 15, 2010.

Motion of Center for Arizona Policy, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Superior Court of Pennsylvania, Harrisburg Office, denied.

Same case below, 990 A.2d 57.
